basic.name: Shadow Charge (Q)
basic.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 130 damage.

basic.name: Fire Stomp (W)
basic.description: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 36 damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

basic.name: Overpower (E)
basic.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Apocalypse (R)
heroic.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

heroic.name: Lightning Breath (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%. Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

trait.name: Black Soulstone (T)
trait.description: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.3% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.After reaching level 10, Diablo only consumes 75 Souls when resurrecting.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 10% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 10 Souls and 20 Armor for 3 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.75% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3.5% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Fire Stomp by 1 second. When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and restore 45 Mana.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of Shadow Charge and Overpower by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%. Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 3% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 33 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 6% for 4 seconds, up to 60%. Heroes Slowed by 24% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
